participant_1.background:
I enjoy baking with my father, and the most valuable thing I own is the time we spend together.
1984 is my favorite book.
i like action movies.
i have twelve kids.
My biggest challenge was overcoming my eating disorder.

participant_2.background:
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.
I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: Hi, welcome to the platform! What do you like to do for fun?
I like baking with my father, and the most valuable thing I own is the time we spend together.
That is so nice! I love spending time with my family too. What kind of things do you like to bake?
We like to make cakes and cookies, but we also like to experiment with new recipes.
That sounds fun! I love trying new recipes too. Do you have a favorite type of cake to bake?
I like to make chocolate cakes the most. What about you?
I like chocolate cake too! It is my favorite kind of cake.
My favorite book is 1984 by George Orwell.
I have heard good things about that book. I have not read it yet.
You should! It is a really good book.
I will add it to my list.
